original: Holm, Tryggve Otto Andreas, bergsingenjör, direktör, Linköping, f. 5/2/ 05 i Kristinehamn av dir. Hans H. o. Augusta Mathiesen. G. 29 m. Gunvor Bruu. Biarn: Inger-Marie ’f. 30, Mar- garetha 34. — Utex. fr. KTH 29. Ing. v. A-B Bofors 29-30, v. Hess Bright Manufact. Co. i Philadelphia, USA, 30-31, stålverksing. v. A-B Bofors 32-36, övering. o. chef f. stålv. där 36-39, verkst. dir. f. A-B Sv. Järnv :verkstä-derna i Linköp. sed. 40. Led. av styr. f. sistn. föret, samt Sv. Aeroplan A-B o. Skand. Träimport A-B.
translated: Holm, Tryggve Otto Andreas, mining engineer, director, from Linköping. Born on February 5th, 1905 in Kristinehamn to director Hans H. and Augusta Mathiesen. Married on June 29th to Gunvor Bruu. Children: Inger-Marie (born in 1930) and Margaretha (born in 1934). Graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1929. Worked as an engineer at AB Bofors from 1929-1930, at Hess Bright Manufacturing Co. in Philadelphia, USA from 1930-1931, as a steelworks engineer at AB Bofors from 1932-1936, as chief engineer for the steelworks there from 1936-1939, and as managing director for AB Swedish Ironworks in Linköping since 1940. Holm is a board member for the aforementioned company as well as for Swedish Aeroplan AB and Skand. Träimport AB.
